summary: Exo is a popular South Korean-Chinese boy band formed in 2011 by SM Entertainment. They debuted with 12 members in 2012, split into Exo-K and Exo-M, but later became a nine-member group. Exo sings in Korean, Mandarin, and Japanese. Their first album, "XOXO," was a big hit, selling over a million copies. They've won many awards and are known as one of the most influential K-pop groups, often called the "Kings of K-pop." Exo also does charity work and endorses brands.
title: Exo
